mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SCHEDULE(schedule_seq, actType, user_id, title, xcontent,start_date, end_date, importance) values(schedule_seq.nextval,#{actType}, #{userId},#{title},#{xcontent}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{importance})
